column5: Merry Christmas all,  from my family to yours  I hope everyone has a fabulous day and that Santa is good to y'all
Wishing you, Diane, Sherri and Marvin a wonderful and peaceful Christmas. Better not let Marvin see that cartoon!!
Same to you,yours and all OFNCer's Lew.All the best in the New Year.  Kerry
the best to you and your family and the whole OFC family, have a great and safe holiday season

Yes, happy holidays, and a very merry christmas to you, Dianne, and Sheri. Darn, it seems wierd to me that I feel like I know you and your family, but have never, ever met you or them. What a place ONFC is, that can make someone feel like you are lifelong friends, but have never met.
Merry Xmas Lew!!  Pam
Lew-  Merry christmas to you and your family!  -  Steven
Merry Christmas to you and your family Lew.  May the new year bring you the "Big Gal" you are searching for.    Whopper
Thanks everyone, and Tom, I think you summed up OFC perfectly
Merry Xmas Lew!
Merry Christmas Lew - hope you have a wonderful one.
Merry Christmas to you and your family Lew.  Wishing you all the best for 2007.
Merry Christmas to you and your gang Lew.have a great holiday season.  Steve
merry xmas lew to you and your family and from our family as well   shawn,julie & angelina[5yr old] she is our little fishergirl in training  have a safe and happy holiday
Merry Christmas Lew to you and your family.  All the best in the New Year.  Tom
Thanks for the wishes, Lew and the laugh.  Have to admit, ole Marv is about the same size!
All the best to you and your Lew.  Joey & Tybo
Merry Christmas Lew. I hope you and the family enjoy the festive season.  Mike
Love that picture Lew!!  Merry Christmas to you and your family as well.  Our little one is dreaming of Santa as I type this.  All the best for a great 2007!  ccmtcanada and blyght
Merry Christmas to Diane, Sheri, Marvin and yourself too, Lew. All the best in the new year.
